title: Bug 22862StyledText  Tab does not tab out of noneditable
description: (Actually, if you set StyledText's style to SWT.READONLY, setEditable(false)is called, so it might be better just to check for editable=false instead ofboth SWT.READONLY or editable=false)
OB: Bug 22862StyledTextTab does not tab out of noneditable
EB: Bugzilla Bug 16205 fixed StyledText such that you can do a tab traversal onmultiline readonly StyledText widget.Since a style of SWT.READONLY isconsidered the same as setEditable(false), StyledText should also allow a tabtraversal on multiline noneditable StyledText widgets.
